name: Cracked Peppermint Candy Bath Salt
description:
Everyone loves peppermint candies during the holiday season. Why not bathe in it. Cracked Peppermint Candy Bath Salt will make you feel like your in peppermint candy heaven!

net weight: 12 oz

Ingredients: Mediterranean Sea Salt, FD&C Red 40, and Peppermint E.O

name: Winter Spice
description:
Entice your senses with the season. Winter Spice handmade soap reminds you of cold winters days and warm winter nights. The perfect soapy gift for the holidays.  

Bars are cut by hand, net weight 4 oz - 4.5

Enter "BUYTWO" at check out for the sales price. Must buy 2 bars for coupon code to work. Sales price 6.54 per bar.

Key Ingredients:
Coconut Oil, Olive Oil, Honey, Vanilla, and Ground Clove

name: Egyptian Rosemary Soap
description:
Handmade in small batches for quality Egyptian Rosemary soap smells delightful and dried rosemary adds a nice exfoliating experience. Enter "BUYTWO" at check out with the purchase of two bars to get the sales price of 6.54.

Bars cut by hand, net weight in oz ranging between 4 oz -4.5 oz

Key Ingredients:
Shea Butter, and Coconut Oil, along with Essential oils

name: Vanilla Chamomile Bath Fizzie
description:
Vanilla Chamomile Bath Fizzie may be used in your bath water or as a shower tablet for aromatherapy. Bath fizzie contains dried fragrance that will float in bath. Not recommended for those who do not like floating bath ingredients. Small muslin bag can be used to prevent floating ingredients (sold seperatly).

3.8oz

Ingredients:
Bicarbonate of soda,citric acid, grape seed oil, dried chamomile, orange peel, dried lemongrass,roasted chicory, licorice, soy lecithin, and clove eo, Mediterranean sea salt

name: Brown Shuggah Solid Bath Scrub
description:
Lovely solid bath scrub easy for use in the shower or bath tub. For the dollz who loves the scrubs but not the mess. 

net weight: 16oz

Ingredients:
Dark Brown Sugar,Coconut Oil Grapeseed Oil, Olive Oil,Vitamin E, Propylene Glycol, Sorbitol, Water, Sodium Stearate, Sodium Laureth Sulfate, Sodium Myristate, Sodium Laurate, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea Butter), Triethanolamine, Titanium Dioxide, Ambergris FO
